description.narrative: Tools and support for Planning, Implementation and Monitoring and Evaluation of the CPAP are made available annually to different programmes and national counterparts by 2018., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation And Research, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2010-2018 - Outcome 6 / Cross-sectoral programme: National monitoring and evaluation structures provide reliable data for monitoring SDGs and other national goals and advocacy for children and women by the end of 2016

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Humanitarian planning and review activities (HRP, RRP, UNICEF HAC)
PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Tools and support for Planning, Implementation and Monitoring and Evaluation of the CPAP are made available annually to different programmes and national counterparts by 2018.

description.narrative: The 2019-2023 Country Programme was approved by the UNICEF Executive Board, and its Programme Strategy Notes were finalized. Quality assurance of annual planning, partnerships with civil society organizations and donor reporting was provided. Implementation of the Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers and budget monitoring were effectively coordinated. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018

title.narrative: % of donor reports submitted on time
# of HACT assurance plan updates per year
Annual reporting completed as per agreed timelines
